homepage.not-authorized: Your profile does not have access to the features that this area offers. Contact your Company Administrator.
homepage.homepage-title: Welcome to the back office area of ​​the App Store!
homepage.homepage-subtitle: To access the functionalities of this area, just click on 'Login'.

givepermission.form-step-1: Let's start by identifying the application that the member will be part of
givepermission.form-step-2: Select the member who will be assigned the permission
givepermission.form-step-3: Select the group the member will be part of and its permissions
givepermission.permission-error: An error occurred while completing the assignment, try again!
